intro: Experience a special chapter in the ongoing mafia tale surrounding the infamous Gallos family!
description:
In this new anthology release of Crime Opera, explore a variety of short stories that take place before, during and after the events of the original visual novel, all presented in beautifully crafted hand-drawn style to convey the drama, emotion and gritty truth surrounding characters’ lives in the criminal underworld.

“A Day in the Strife” spotlights the daily life of Terry Childers, a side character from The Butterfly Effect. In the “Recollections” chapter, Molly and Alice get together to reminisce about the past, revisiting critical moments from both their histories. Finally, “Aftermath” serves as an epilogue exploring the immediate fallout of The Butterfly Effect and the impact it has on many intertwined lives.

• Navigate multiple side stories within the Crime Opera chronology!
• Discover the many ways lives are intertwined in the criminal underworld.
• Gain new insight into the personalities and circumstances of key characters!
• Unlock scenes and view them anytime in gallery mode.
• Enjoy vibrant and detailed visuals presented in hand-drawn style!
